name: Welcome to Kaetram
description: Teaching you the very basics of Kaetram.|This tutorial will teach you how to move around, attack, interact with objects and use ranged weapons. Follow the arrows and talk to the NPCs if you are stuck.

text: Olá! Bem-vindo! Clique em mim novamente!
Legal, você está pegando o jeito...
Eu sou o programador, e criei este mundo.
Procure o guarda lá fora para começar sua aventura.
Você pode se movimentar clicando, ou usando as teclas WASD ou as setas.
Boa sorte na sua jornada!
completedText: Vá até a saída para encontrar o guarda e iniciar sua aventura.

text: Ah, você chegou! Como está se sentindo para sua jornada?
Vejo que você está sem nenhuma arma... isso é perigoso!
Tome esta lança de bronze. É básica, mas vai ajudar você a se defender.
Abra seu inventário com a tecla I para equipar a lança que acabei de lhe dar.
Há uma pequena caverna logo ali com alguns ratos fracos.
É um lugar perfeito para você praticar suas habilidades de combate.
Vá lá e elimine alguns desses ratos para ganhar experiência.
Quando terminar, volte para continuarmos seu treinamento.
Não se preocupe se ficar difícil - esses ratos são bem fracos.
completedText: Verifique seu inventário, equippe a lança que dei a você e vá até a caverna para derrotar os ratos.

text: Excellent work! You're catching on quickly.
I see you've mastered the basics of combat.
Now let's continue with some resource gathering skills.
Let me teach you about woodcutting.
Here's an axe you can use to cut trees.
completedText: Go on, cut two trees for me.

text: Okay perfect, you can use logs to make sticks.
Take this knife and use it to fletch some sticks.
Simply click on the item in your inventory and select the interact option.
completedText: Go on, fletch the logs into sticks for me.

hasItemText: Awesome, just bear with me a little longer.
I know it's boring but I am obligated to teach you this.
Now take this fishing pole and go catch two shrimps for me.
completedText: Go on, catch two shrimps for me.

text: Great, one more thing and we're done with the boring stuff.
It's as much of a chore for me as it is for you so don't worry.
Go click on that cooking pot and cook these shrimps for me.
completedText: Go on, cook the shrimps for me.

text: Wow I actually didn't expect you to be competent.
You're already familiar with combat using the spear.
The last thing I can teach you within my curriculum is archery.
For the sake of this tutorial, you will not need to equip any arrows.
Plus it saves us a ton of money for the arrows we don't have to give you.
Take this bow and show me what you've learned.
completedText: Go on, kill 2 crabs for me using this bow.

text: That will be all. The rest is up to you to discover.
You may leave the tutorial by going through the portal.
completedText: That will be all. The rest is up to you to discover.
You may leave the tutorial by going through the portal.
